articles.title: Woman killed , five injured as car crashes into divider on ORR near Pedda Golcon
articles.summary: A 31-year-old woman was killed and five others were seriously injured after a speeding car crashed into a divider on the Outer Ring Road (ORR) near Pedda Golconda early on Friday (December 26, 2025). The deceased was identified as Kothagadi Shirisha, a homemaker and resident of Sangareddy. The injured persons in the car included the deceased womanâ€™s 10-year-old daughter, Sandhya, 36, and her 9-year-old daughter, Veeramani, 45, and Sharada, 40. Th

articles.title: Death toll in UPS plane crash in Kentucky rises to 15
articles.summary: U.S. news Death toll in UPS plane crash in Kentucky rises to 15 On Nov. 4, a UPS plane headed from Louisville to Honolulu crashed during takeoff. A plume of smoke after the crash of a UPS plane at Louisville International Airport on Nov. 4, 2025. Jon Cherry / AP file Add NBC News to Google Dec. 26, 2025, 10:38 AM EST By Kate Reilly A 15th person has died as a result of the UPS plane crash in Kentucky in November. Louisville Mayor Craig Greenberg
